body_html:
thanks, @gabrielibagon.

I have something like that here., although I used the keras generator format because I could not deal with a video input pipeline using tensorflow methods.

I might refactor it to tf.Dataset someday but it's working for now. :)

thanks, @gabrielibagon.

body:
thanks, @gabrielibagon.

I have something like that [here](https://github.com/ricoms/deep_memorability/blob/master/deep_memorability/trainer2/experiment.py)., although I used the keras generator format because I could not deal with a video input pipeline using tensorflow methods.

I might refactor it to tf.Dataset someday but it's working for now. :)
